identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a hyper-local delivery experience that feels physical, urgent, and premium. Reject generic 'SaaS' flatness. Embrace texture (glass), depth (shadows), and motion.
core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss ease with Neo-Brutalist contrast.
Emotion First: Customer = Hunger/Desire; Agent = Speed/Focus.
Thumb-First: All primary actions within the bottom 30% of the screen.
No Loading Spinners: Use skeleton screens and shimmer effects.

GlassCard.description: A card with blurred background, used for floating elements over maps or images.
GlassCard.implementation: Use <BlurView> as container with intensity={80} tint='light'. Add 1px solid border with rgba(255,255,255,0.4).

BentoGrid.description: Asymmetrical grid for categories. Not boring equal squares.
BentoGrid.rules: Mix 2x1 (wide) and 1x1 (square) tiles. Use Flexbox with 'flexWrap: wrap' and percentage widths (e.g., '48%' and '100%').

ActionSheet.description: Bottom sheet for secondary actions. Replaces native alerts.

banners.description: Hero Banner: Man holding delicious burger (Dark contrast)
Secondary Banner: Fresh vegetables top view

delivery.usage: Order Tracking Map Overlay / Agent Onboarding

instructions_to_main_agent: CRITICAL: Do NOT use HTML tags (div, span). Use <View>, <Text>, <Image>.
CRITICAL: Do NOT use className or Tailwind classes. Use 'style={styles.container}'.
CRITICAL: Use 'expo-router' for navigation. File-based routing in /app directory.
CRITICAL: Create a 'constants/Colors.ts' file first with the provided palette.
CRITICAL: Create a 'components/ui' folder for reusable atoms (Button, Card, Input).
CRITICAL: For shadows, use the provided shadow objects. Android needs 'elevation', iOS needs 'shadow*'.
CRITICAL: Add 'data-testid' prop to all TouchableOpacity/Pressable elements for testing.
ROLE SWITCHING: Implement a 'RoleSwitcher' component in the header that toggles the global theme/context.
LAYOUT: Ensure 'SafeAreaView' (from react-native-safe-area-context) wraps all screens to handle notches.
IMAGES: Use <Image> from 'expo-image' for better caching and performance.
ICONS: Use specific icon families: Feather for UI (menu, user), Ionicons for actions (cart, add).
Universal Guidelines: Avoid gradients on text. Avoid centered text for long descriptions (use left align).
Create a 'useTheme' hook to manage light/dark modes and role-based colors.
